com.lukflug.panelstudio.theme

Interface IRadioRenderer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IRadioRendererProxy

    public interface IRadioRenderer
    Interface abstracting the rendering of a radio button list.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDefaultHeight(ILabeled[] items, boolean horizontal)
      Returns the default height
      default java.awt.Rectangle getItemRect(Context context, ILabeled[] items, int index, boolean horizontal)
      Returns the rectangle for a given item
      void renderItem(Context context, ILabeled[] items, boolean focus, int target, double state, boolean horizontal)
      Render the radio button list.

    • Method Detail

      • renderItem

        void renderItem(Context context,
                ILabeled[] items,
                boolean focus,
                int target,
                double state,
                boolean horizontal)
        Render the radio button list.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to be used
        items - a list of all items
        focus - the current focus state
        target - the currently selected option
        state - the animated transition state
        horizontal - whether the list is horizontal or vertical

      • getDefaultHeight

        int getDefaultHeight(ILabeled[] items,
                     boolean horizontal)
        Returns the default height
        Parameters:
        items - a list of all items
        horizontal - whether the list is horizontal or vertical
        Returns:
        the default height

      • getItemRect

        default java.awt.Rectangle getItemRect(Context context,
                                       ILabeled[] items,
                                       int index,
                                       boolean horizontal)
        Returns the rectangle for a given item
        Parameters:
        context - the context to be used
        items - a list of all items
        index - the index of the item in question
        horizontal - whether the list is horizontal or vertical
        Returns:
        the rectangle for that item
